channel.title: Github on Hi! I'm Melvin
channel.description: Recent content in Github on Hi! I'm Melvin

item.title: Hugo, Wercker and Github Pages
item.description: From Hugo for Github Pages Recently I’ve started using Hugo to build my personal homepage and blog while serving it using Github Pages. First I started out by updating my Github Pages repository using a deploy script within the Hugo file repository. Of course that’s not the way to go so instead I’ve been building a deployment pipeline using Wercker. TL;DR Create Github repositories (Hugo & Github Pages)
